title: Bad Man's River (1971 Western) The gang, the rebels, the army. She sold them all down the river

sources.title: Bad Man's River (1971 Western) The gang, the rebels, the army. She sold them all down the river
sources.description:
A HAWK... A VULTURE... and A DOVE... All circling for the biggest haul in the WEST!!
A gang of outlaws teams up with a double-dealing revolutionary to blow up an arsenal, only to discover the mission is a smokescreen for stealing a million-dollar government payout. Betrayals stack higher than the loot as alliances shift and everyone scrambles for the money. In a final twist, the prize proves as elusive as loyalty, leaving the survivors scheming their next move...

Director: Eugenio Martín
Writers: Philip Yordan, Eugenio Martín
Genres: Dark Comedy, Romance, Spaghetti Western

Main actors:
Lee Van Cleef - Roy King
Gina Lollobrigida - Alicia King
James Mason - Montero
Simón Andreu - Angel Santos
Gianni Garko - Ed Pace
Diana Lorys - Dolores
Sergio Fantoni - Colonel Enrique Fierro
Aldo Sambrell - Canales
Jess Hahn - Tom Odie
Daniel Martín - Falso Montero
Luis Rivera - Orozco
Lone Fleming - Conchita
Eduardo Fajardo - General Duarte
José Manuel Martín - Mexican Soldier

This film is available with dubbed Spanish audio, and subtitles in many languages.  Go to settings ⚙️ to change your language options from the drop down menu.

@CultCinemaClassics
